body_html: The installation steps in the article were adapted from original Caffe2 build instructions since I had built it pre and post Pytorch merging. I didn't build with Anaconda though. I can access the build environment today and confirm the validity of the instruction.

body: The installation steps in the article were adapted from original Caffe2 build instructions since I had built it pre and post Pytorch merging. I didn't build with Anaconda though. I can access the build environment today and confirm the validity of the instruction.
